Desc.entry: Voluntary/community organisation and registered charity which runs courses in web page design, film/video, graphic design, music technology, animation, digital photography, desk top publishing, key skills and an Expressive Arts Award. Accredited vocational courses are available for the community and young people aged 13-19 years. Also delivers literacy and numeracy levels 1 and 2 and wider key skills as well as computer internet training for older people with little or no experience with computers. Also hosts a news web portal, reporting on local and national issues. Company limited by guarantee no 4201503.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-4.30pm (office times); Wed 10am-12.30pm (drop-in for adult learners with very little experience of computers)

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
